alert.note: Alert for Adair (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:16AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Benton, northwestern Washington and northern Adair Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 716 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles west of Seligman to 3 miles north of Christie. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Springdale... Rogers... Bentonville... Siloam Springs... Bella Vista... Lowell... Pea Ridge... Gentry... Tontitown... Bethel Heights... Lincoln... Cave Springs... Decatur... Westville... Highfill... Garfield... Gateway... Watts... Springtown... Christie... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 72 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
